title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in billion U.S. dollars, with a total of 8 data points.
Overall Sales in billion U.S. dollars has decreased over the Year.
Sales in billion U.S. dollars is slightly decreasing from 2016 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2010, and lastly roughly constant from 2010 to 2009.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2015.
Max Sales in billion U.S. dollars about 80.55 was recorded at Year 2016
Min Sales in billion U.S. dollars about 58.25 was recorded at Year 2009
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales in billion U.S. dollars with a total of 8 data points. The chart has one significant trend.
This trend is decreasing which exists from 2009 to 2016.
